author: robowarrior_prime
title: gimmick mars an otherwise good action figure
review:
Pros

  • excellent face plate
  • gun metal parts
  • rock parts
  • quite a few extra parts (the orange spikes)
  • orange brain piece
  • printed piece
  • good detailing on upper right chest
  • fun uppercut gimmick

Cons

  • heavy on one side due to gimmick
  • non-articulated right arm due to gimmick
